name: Classroom A1
subject: Mathematics
description: A spacious math classroom equipped with whiteboards, projectors, and group seating arrangements.

name: Classroom B1
subject: English
description: Bright and engaging English classroom filled with books, posters, and creative learning spaces.

name: Classroom C1
subject: Physics
description: Well-equipped physics lab with experimental tools, high stools, and large workbenches for group activities.

name: Classroom D1
subject: Chemistry
description: Modern chemistry lab with safety equipment, fume hoods, and shelves full of scientific instruments.

name: Classroom E1
subject: Biology
description: Interactive biology classroom with models, microscopes, and nature charts on every wall.

name: Classroom F1
subject: History
description: A calm and quiet room filled with history maps, timelines, and documentary visuals.

name: Classroom G1
subject: Geography
description: Dynamic classroom with 3D globes, world maps, and digital screens for geographical simulations.

name: Classroom H1
subject: Computer Science
description: Fully digital computer lab with desktop stations, high-speed internet, and interactive programming boards.
